Best
Great App

It does NOT transfer FOLDERS! I was told this app transferred entire folders from one Android device to another. It does not do that. Instead, it only shows you the contents from certain folders - the ones that have either videos, music or photos - but ignores any other folder containing any other type of file that isn't a media file. I wanted to transfer very specific folders from one phone to another phone. This app does not allow that. Uninstalling now.
Awesome app

Browsing for files is pretty rough, it's very sluggish and slow to load certain folders. Hopefully it's not trying to index through my millions of photos each time I try to send something. I really can't understand the slowness. Maybe the app is not optimized for Android 12?
Superb amazing smooth like butter.. Much needed app with simplicity. Developer Veil Tasali is awesome

Currently, it's the best app for sharing files. No ads, seamless experience, no connecting issue, and beautiful UI make it the most superior to other apps. I hope the developers will keep it in the same way.

This is a lie. It claims no Wifi is needed. It requires Wifi so its a lie.

Finally found good file sharing apps with decent-high transfer speed and no ridiculous permissions. If you could make it easier to chose the storage location or let us select a different default storage location from the setting section, it would be helpful. There was no list view within video folders. I prefer folder view for folders containg audio/music and photos (just like video section) and hope you add an option for that as well as some basic sorting option. Keep it up.
I haven't had any problems with this app so far. It does everything that it should.
FAALTU APP. TOTAL WASTE OF TIME. DO NOT EVER INSTALL THIS APP. DO NOT TRUST OTHER REVIEWS

bug

Fast & easy to tranfer files from different devices. Also has the feature that I'm looking for which is the folder transfer. Though with the changes in android security, (specifically Xiaomi) got trouble with the location for saving transferred files. I had to download a different file browser just to access the internal data & move the files outside. This is a huge hassle for users (referring to google security.) I hope the DevTeam can find a way to work this out. Overall, best app for transfer
Best transfer app but I was a bit confused where are files going when receiving but after a bit of searching I found that I can select where to save it

I've used for years, and the redesign is much simpler, still works great. I usually select files in the FOSS Ghost Commander file manager and "send to" TrebleShot. In the new version, when sending via Web, the receiver no longer has the option to download all the files in a single click (eg. zip) which I miss.
Love it. Perfect file sharing..no stuck, slows, does the job well
It needs an update for newer Android versions. Works best on Android 10 and earlier.
Excellent app .Really is complete I don't think you need the desktop app anymore since web functionality fills in the void

I don't know why not working with my Nokia 2.4 - Android 10. Camera can't complete QR Scan, asking retry again and again. Same happening with Nokia 2.3. Note: camera of both phones working well to scan QR code with other apps like GoolePay and other transaction apps. I there are much need of update to fix that, it's a very valuable app. üíê

It's not as intuitive as it could be, but I got it working after I explored the options it presents. No ads, bloatware or other foolishness that most file transfer apps include.

On Android 10 (LineageOS to be specific) it can't do anything other than sharing via browser. Anything else: "Turn on location service" while it has the permission and location is on. I guess it has something to do with Android 10 as someone else had this issue in the comments.
Very nice and easy way to move files from mobile to pc

Wow thanks so much guys ! This is actually BETTER than Airdroid (with its RAPACIOUS disgusting OTT cost - and by SUBSCRIPTION too. NEVER !) and the TEN other apps I waded through. For a start it can move folders and ultimately its easier. It did take me a bit to understand - it could be a LITTLE simpler. For example, having frequent destination devices appear 1) without having to hit + sign 2) at the top, not the bottom. Ease is essential. Plus it'd be great if you could choose the destination folder for each received file. Also, SINGLE columns of files are easier on my brain (you can also read the whole filename). But overall I've found my replacement for the ease with which ES Explorer used to send files between Androids. Thank Gough there are still altruistic big-hearted clever humans out there! You guys rock!
What's best is it has no ads. Also you don't need to have internet connection, just make yourself used to this app. I recommend using hotspot method and scan the QR code. It's simple
I don't know why people are reviewing it so bad it is easy to use. I've been using it from last 6 months as someone posted about it on reddit and it works flawlessly

Best file-sharing app I've come across. No frills setup, clean UI, no ads pr trackers, foss all the way. There's also a desktop client now which basically fills any gaps there were left. You don't need another app if you have this.
The beat file sharing app. Also, its FOSS. Couldn't ask for more.

I had high expectations for this app but was sadly disappointed. I spent over 30 minutes trying to get the app to work between android phones on the same network, it just didn't work. The app is over complicated, a pain to get configured and just fairly useless. If you just need to share files quickly, I recommend an app called Fetchit, within a few seconds I could share files with ease. I hope the developers can look at this app and maybe make something a little more user friendly that works.
pure.
An excellent alternative to the much more famous file-sharing apps. Highly recommended. Edit: With the latest update (v1.2.8) the developer has just made it much more sleek.
Simple. Beautiful. Does exactly what it says.
Good and secured app

Amazing! File sharing made fast and simple. Devices connect quick and easy, and the files are exchanged in no time flat. Couldn't be better. If you are looking to exchange files between devices on the same network, this is the app you need. I have transfered multiple GB with it already. The devs are very helpful and interested in making the best app possible.
Plzz add search option and group folders & files (music, photos, videos). Best sharing app without nuisance.
Day 365 still figuring out how to send files, please make this user-friendly developer!

Much needed alternative to data mining apps like shareit and xender. Fully open source without comprising on your privacy. However the UI needs some improvement so as to make easy for the new user to understand and share files instantly.
Better than bloated shareit

Best shareit alternative. I've been looking for FOSS apps that allow for 
wifi direct transfers. Only options were shady ad ridden Spyware apps. 
Trebleshot is a wonderful breather in this space and I've recommended it to 
all my friendsk

Finally a great Wi-Fi Direct capable file sharing app with no ads! 
Definitely, after a long-time search, this great app has no rival and is 
the best in its class. Many thanks!

New Edit: uninstalling and giving my final honest review. Reason i have 
mailed. Old: When clicking button of creating wifi hotspot, you should add 
an option button to choose "2.4 GHz" or "5 GHz" because my phone supports 
5GHz wifi and it gives me 25-30 MB/s speed. 2.4 GHz just gives maximum 4-6 
MB/s. In future, Don't add stupid functions like ads videos, news, music 
etc etc. Keep app clean, fast, and simple UI. And ya remove that text 
sharing bro its useless i know u have done hard work for that small feature 
but just remove it and move on. I will add 5th star when my wish will be 
fulfilled.
